= Taxonomy module =

Get the number of Taxonomies available:

<a href="http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/taxonomy/count" target="_blank">
    http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/taxonomy/count
</a>

Get one Taxonomy by Id (this Id is the internal JBioWH WID that change in all DB):

<a href="http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/taxonomy/1825522" target="_blank">
    http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/taxonomy/1825522
</a>

Get from/to Taxonomies by range:

<a href="http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/taxonomy/1/3" target="_blank">
    http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/taxonomy/1/3
</a>

Get the Taxonomy by !TaxId:

<a href="http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/taxonomy/taxid/9006" target="_blank">
    http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/taxonomy/taxid/9606
</a>

Search Taxonomies by string using % (search all "Homo`*`"):

<a href="http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/taxonomy/search/homo%25" target="_blank">
    http://net.icgeb.org/jbiowh-webservices/webservices/taxonomy/search/homo%25
</a>
